title: game cant start
body: today i logged in my account and went a normal game. I picked champ and then game didnt load and show me a button reconect. I pressed it but nothing happened.Can someone help my please?

replies.body: Are you receiving any errors?  Did the game transfer over to the loading screen, or did you see something else?  I'd like to help but need some more details.  Let me know!

The last  week or so me and my friend, in about 70% of our games  cant play , after champion selection ends and we go to the loading screen , all we see is a black screen  and then after some second its says : "you have been disconected from the internet please recconect , but the thing is none of us have net issues and even if we try to recconect is says the same thing, the only thing that fixes that is by restarting our pc , but apparently we cant do that every freaking time, Both pc are high end , and never had any net issues, we can conenct or talk through skype while this happens. Lost two placement games cause of that + leaverbuster..
Not even a comment on this, got the same problem as well  and i cant seem to fix it
Same issues started about 3 night ago... internet works fine for everything but League.
